i got number request code . 
so . 
it written 80x86 asm . 
borland tasm . 
tasm lga.asm tlink lga.asm the code lga ncryption c nick nassuphi code segment assum cscode dscode org 100h start jmp begin gas particl assig bit 0 particl move east bit 1 particl move west bit 2 particl move north bit 3 particl move south bit 4 particl move east bit 5 particl move west bit 6 particl move north bit 7 particl move south collisiong rule 1 . 
gas rule if e w and ! n s then ew-n if n s and ! e w then ns-ew nibbl 1100 0011 0011 0011 byte 11000000 00110000 00110000 11000000 00001100 00000011 00000011 00001100 00110011 11001100 00111100 11000011 11000011 00111100 11001100 00110011 2 .

the data encod particl db digit gas whose time evolut simul db cellular-automaton type algorithm . 
decrypt db achiev run simul revers . 
db a thermodynam argument ensur even singl db bit flip decrypt data possibl db db after gas let evolv 256 timestep db one either run revers evolut press db space flip bit run press ' 0 ' db db for cryptograph applic key would consist db number time step time locat db specif bit invers . 
db db db db db fill gas piec code initga mov dicssrcptr mov sioffset data mov cxlineno ig0 push di push cx mov cxmaxbyt ig1 mov alcssi mov csdial inc si inc di loop ig1 pop cx pop di add dimaxbyt loop ig0 mov sicssrcptr mov dioffset initga mov cxmaxbyte3 mov al0 lg2 mov byte ptr cssial not al inc si loop lg2 ret display gas molecul bounc around showga push es push si push di push cx push bx mov ax0b800h mov esax mov sicssrcptr mov di1602102 mov cxlineno-3 add simaxbyte3 sg1 push cx push di mov cxmaxbyt sg2 mov alcssi mov byte ptr esdial inc si add di2 dec cx jnz sg2 pop di pop cx add di160 loop sg1 pop bx pop cx pop di pop si pop es ret cssi sours data csdi destin data scanonemiddlelin first byte special case warparound mov bl0 al assembl byte . 
mov bhcssi-maxbyt north one line lower and bh10001000b bit 7 3 or blbh or assembl byte mov bhcssimaxbyt south one line higher and bh01000100b bit 6 2 or blbh place stuff al mov bhcssimaxbyte-1 west one byte left lower and bh00100010b bit 5 1 or blbh mov bhcssi1 east one byte right higher and bh00010001b bit 4 0 or blbh mov bh0 mov albyt ptr csbx offset hpprule mov csdial inc si inc di middl byte handl loop mov cxmaxbyte-2 sol1 mov bl0 al assembl byte .
